comprehensive_overview: p11-kit is a library to manage PKCS#11 modules. It enables multiple applications to use the same PKCS#11 module in parallel, ensures that applications get access to the same serialized view of the module's state, and handles sharing access to the module state among applications.
core_features: Enables multiple applications to use the same module
Provides a serialized view of the module's state
Handles sharing access to the module state among applications
